mean_en: the action of defeating someone and forcing them to obey you; a situation in which someone controls you and you have to obey them
sentence: After losing many battles, the European tribes were in subjection to the Roman Empire.
sentence_trans: 欧洲的部落历经多次战败后，都服从于罗马帝国。
word_etyma: subject服从的 + ion名词后缀 → subjection 服从
